title: How to Make a Trapped Chest in Minecraft

steps.title: The wood will help you craft wooden planks.
steps.content: The wood will help you craft wooden planks. You can gather wood from trees by attacking them with your hands or with an axe .

steps.title: Open your crafting menu and craft wooden planks from wood.
steps.content: Open your crafting menu and craft wooden planks from wood. You'll need 15 wooden planks to craft everything you need.

steps.title: Open your crafting menu and craft sticks from 2 wooden planks.
steps.content: Open your crafting menu and craft sticks from 2 wooden planks. You only need one stick.

steps.title: Use a stone, iron, or diamond pickaxe to mine iron ore deep underground.
steps.content: Use a stone, iron, or diamond pickaxe to mine iron ore deep underground. Iron ore resembles stone blocks with yellowish spots on them. Then you'll need to smelt the iron ore furnace to make iron ingots. You can also find iron ingots in chests found in villages, temples, and abandoned buildings.

steps.title: You'll need redstone dust to trigger a trap.
steps.content: You'll need redstone dust to trigger a trap. Redstone dust can be mined from redstone ore deep underground using an iron or diamond pickaxe. Redstone ore resembles stone blocks with red spots on it.

steps.title: Open your crafting menu and craft a crafting table from 4 wooden planks.
steps.content: Open your crafting menu and craft a crafting table from 4 wooden planks. Then place the crafting table anywhere.

steps.title: Open your crafting table.
steps.content: Open your crafting table. Then, place 8 wooden planks in along the edge of the 3x3 grid. Drag the chest into your inventory.

steps.title: Open your crafting table.
steps.content: Open your crafting table. Place 1 stick in the center space of the 3x3 grid, an iron ingot in the space above it, and a wood plank in the space below. Drag the tripwire hooks into your inventory. This creates 2 tripwire hooks, but you only need one.

steps.title: Open your crafting table.
steps.content: Open your crafting table. Place the chest in the center space of the 3x3 grid. Then, place a tripwire hook in the space to the left or right of the chest. Drag the trapped chest into your inventory.

steps.title: Find a location and place the trapped chest where it'll be visible.
steps.content: Find a location and place the trapped chest where it'll be visible. Use redstone dust to connect the trapped chest to a redstone contraption. You can place redstone dust underground below the trapped chest. Connect the trapped chest to TNT or a trapped door. You can also connect it to a dispenser loaded with arrows to shoot arrows at anyone who opens the chest.
